function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Teleworking may improve labor productivity through saving travel times.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission due to reduced social distancing and increased human interaction in the workplace.","Mitigation":"Enforcing strict hygiene and distancing protocols, reducing the number of employees in physical office spaces.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, air purification systems, and remote temperature monitoring.","People":"Employees, visitors, and customers in the workplace.","Owner":"Employers and building management."},{"Description":"Smart solutions such as telemedicine and teleworking may improve citizen satisfaction, enhancing social resilience.","Impact":"Increased reliance on virtual interactions may lead to reduced physical health and social connectedness, contributing to mental health challenges.","Mitigation":"Promoting physical activity and social interaction outside of virtual platforms, providing mental health support and counseling services.","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, mental health apps, virtual social engagement tools.","People":"Citizens who rely heavily on telemedicine and teleworking, individuals experiencing social isolation.","Owner":"Healthcare providers, local community organizations."},{"Description":"Promoting the use of inclusive smart solutions that raise awareness and create innovative platforms for engagement of all citizens in social activities.","Impact":"Over-reliance on virtual engagement may lead to decreased community initiatives.","Technologies":"Community engagement apps, neighborhood social platforms, local event coordination tools.","People":"Community members who engage in virtual community activities, residents who rely on virtual community services.","Owner":"Local community organizations, city planners, and community leaders."}]}
